title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; identical API surface to the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as standard LLM/Chat/Embedding classes.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (ChatGPT-style) for Ollama servers; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI (text UI) for chatting, managing models, and browsing history powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local LLM code completion via Ollama (GitHub Copilot alternative).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama REST API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CI) module to spin up ephemeral Ollama services for integration tests inside pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG with Chroma, function-calling, fine-tune adapters, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of Ollama server, CUDA variants, and dev shells.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama as a remote LLM backend for Claude Desktop & friends.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI assistant pane powered by any Ollama model locally.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin for inline LLM prompts, block summarization, and flash-card generation via Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment config to scale Ollama models across GPU clusters with autoscaling and batching.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for end-to-end NLP pipelines.
